column1: Actually Cochrane says infections fall in the two weeks after vaccination  And you love chochrane  Remember how you quote  them about flu vaccine.

Steven keeps saying  “When I bring you to America...” like she’s already been approved. Who’s taking financial responsibility for Olga AND a newborn since it appears he has no job? Isn’t that something they ask? Gawtdamn  this stupid kid gives me a headache... #90DayFiance
